QuestData.Title: The Silent Skull: Taking from the Taker
QuestData.Description:
With the reagents found, you should seek out Grinning Tolg's camp in the nearby cave to brew the elixir.
Once the elixir is consumed, you should be able to communicate with the ravagers there. With any luck, they should be able to bring you to Skulltaker.
His mask should bring a hefty reward.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Laughing Skull elixir to find Skulltaker and claim the Silent Skull.

Objectives.Objective: Drink the elixir and find a way to reach Skulltaker
